sentences.english: Some measures need to be taken to cut out the dead wood and streamline production.
sentences.chinese: 應採取措施裁汰冗員，以“提高”生產效率。

sentences.english: Nearly all the redundant worker have been absorbed into other departments.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有冗員，都已調往其他部門任職。
裁減政府部門中的冗員。

sentences.chinese: 應採取措施裁汰冗員，以提高生產效率。

sentences.english: When it comes to the state-controlled media, one challenge is their bloated bureaucracies.
sentences.chinese: 說到國有媒體，冗員是個挑戰。
